Info.Description: Shifts the image along the x (horizontal) and y (vertical) axes. The parts of the image that go beyond the frame wrap around to the other side, giving a seamless effect. It's useful for creating repetitive patterns or for adjusting the composition of the image without cropping.

Properties.Name: Offset X
Properties.Summary: Adjusts the horizontal shift of the image. Positive values move the image to the right, while negative values move it to the left.

Properties.Name: Offset Y
Properties.Summary: Adjusts the vertical shift of the image. Positive values move the image down, while negative values move it up.
